channel.title: Haagen Dazs on Simba Tango

item.title: Super super dulce...
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VFx02G3kg9E

The Argentines are crazy about sweets, and so will you be after staying there for a while. Take care, the alfajores de Havanna are dangerously good. The cones are for the conoisseurs…

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QT6JHS5lgQM

And while you are relaxing before going out for the milongas, they got a tv show just for making sweets and desserts, called super dulce. I did not find it on youtube, the theme song is hilarious, and you can find a short sample on the super dulce home page.
